description: This is a RFP for helicopter charter services for visitor safety and other park management operations in Canadian National Parks. The contract duration is from August 1, 2024 to September 30, 2024. Anyone may participate in the procurement process.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Reference:** 5P420-24-0048/A

**Date Published:** 2024-07-19

**Closing Date:** 2024-07-29T16:00:00

## Tender Description

Parks Canada Agency is requesting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Helicopter Charter Services, Visitor Safety. The services will be used for visitor safety and general park management operations. The contract period will be from August 1, 2024, to September 30, 2024, as a pilot project.

**Scope of Work**

* Transport of Parks Canada personnel and equipment in a safe and reliable manner
* Performance of specialized search and rescue operations
* Safe and reliable water delivery for wildland fire management
* Performance of other specialized fire management operations
* Support of other park management operations

**Submission Requirements**

* Bids must be submitted via fax or email to [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca)
* Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted
* Please see attached document for detailed submission requirements and guidelines

## Important Instructions

* All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority
* Enquiries must be received no later than three (3) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing
* Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
* Late submissions will not be considered

## Contact Information

* Terry Imm, Contracting Authority
* Email: [Terry.Imm@pc.gc.ca](mailto:Terry.Imm@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (250) 837-1659
* Fax: (866) 246-6893

## Languages of Service

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* Parks Canada has made every effort to provide equivalent documents in both languages, however, if you find any discrepancies between the English and French documents, please notify the Contracting Authority

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: British
